alert.note: Alert for Forest (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 9:13PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN FOREST COUNTY THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 912 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Chapman State Park to 9 miles southwest of Marienville. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Marienville, Clarington, Clear Creek State Park, and Cook Forest State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
